snippet.title: Swivel Shooter
snippet.description:
A difficult top-down shooter with a simple concept: you always shoot through the center point of the screen. Instead of aiming your attacks, focus on precise movements and positioning to avoid enemies and lead them to their deaths.

My first game; made with the Godot engine.

My Twitter: https://twitter.com/austintradr
Itch.io Page: https://atr.itch.io/swivel-shooter
